headline: NORWEGIAN CRUISE LINE IS MAKING A SPLASH THIS WINTER WITH THE OPENING OF AN ALL-NEW EXPANSIVE POOL AND MORE GUEST EXPERIENCES AT GREAT STIRRUP CAY, ITS PRIVATE ISLAND IN THE BAHAMAS
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line® (NCL), the innovator in global cruise travel, has unveiled new images of the first highly anticipated enhancements to Great Stirrup Cay, its private island in the Bahamas – a 1.4-acre pool area featuring an expansive heated pool, Splash Harbor splash pad for young guests, Vibe Shore Club for adults and much more.

headline: Should You Buy, Sell or Retain Carnival Stock at a 12.94X P/E?
summary: CCL trades at a valuation discount even after a 35% rally, backed by record bookings, margin gains and balance-sheet repair, but rising costs loom.

raw.headline: Should You Buy, Sell or Retain Carnival Stock at a 12.94X P/E?
raw.summary: CCL trades at a valuation discount even after a 35% rally, backed by record bookings, margin gains and balance-sheet repair, but rising costs loom.

headline: Oceania Cruises® Announces Transition to Adults-Only Experience
summary: Oceania Cruises®, the world's leading culinary- and destination-focused luxury cruise line, is ushering in a new era of tranquility and sophistication at sea. Effective January 7, 2026, the cruise line will exclusively welcome guests aged 18 and older for all new reservations for future voyages, elevating the onboard ambiance and responding to the preferences of its guests.
